name: Crafted_Decimation_E
display_help: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Damage, Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
